alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 15 at 4:55AM EDT until July 15 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Panhandle Florida, including the following counties, Holmes and Washington. * WHEN...Until 700 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 355 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen in the last 1 Hour. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Vernon, Bonifay, Bradford, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Wausau, Westville, Five Points, Whitehead Crossroads, Hulaw, Johnson Crossroads, Poplar Head and Brock Crossroad. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
